00084   template<typename eT>
00085   inline
00086   void
00087   getrf_(int* m, int* n, eT* a, int* lda, int* ipiv, int* info)
00088     {
00089     arma_type_check<is_supported_blas_type<eT>::value == false>::apply();
00090     
00091     if(is_float<eT>::value == true)
00092       {
00093       typedef float T;
00094       sgetrf_(m, n, (T*)a, lda, ipiv, info);
00095       }
00096     else
00097     if(is_double<eT>::value == true)
00098       {
00099       typedef double T;
00100       dgetrf_(m, n, (T*)a, lda, ipiv, info);
00101       }
00102     else
00103     if(is_supported_complex_float<eT>::value == true)
00104       {
00105       typedef std::complex<float> T;
00106       cgetrf_(m, n, (T*)a, lda, ipiv, info);
00107       }
00108     else
00109     if(is_supported_complex_double<eT>::value == true)
00110       {
00111       typedef std::complex<double> T;
00112       zgetrf_(m, n, (T*)a, lda, ipiv, info);
00113       }
00114     }

00300   inline
00301   void
00302   gesvd_
00303     (
00304     char* jobu, char* jobvt, int* m, int* n, eT* a, int* lda,
00305     eT* s, eT* u, int* ldu, eT* vt, int* ldvt,
00306     eT* work, int* lwork, int* info
00307     )
00308     {
00309     arma_type_check<is_supported_blas_type<eT>::value == false>::apply();
00310     
00311     if(is_float<eT>::value == true)
00312       {
00313       typedef float T;
00314       sgesvd_(jobu, jobvt, m, n, (T*)a, lda, (T*)s, (T*)u, ldu, (T*)vt, ldvt, (T*)work, lwork, info);
00315       }
00316     else
00317     if(is_double<eT>::value == true)
00318       {
00319       typedef double T;
00320       dgesvd_(jobu, jobvt, m, n, (T*)a, lda, (T*)s, (T*)u, ldu, (T*)vt, ldvt, (T*)work, lwork, info);

00326   template<typename T>
00327   inline
00328   void
00329   cx_gesvd_
00330     (
00331     char* jobu, char* jobvt, int* m, int* n, std::complex<T>* a, int* lda,
00332     T* s, std::complex<T>* u, int* ldu, std::complex<T>* vt, int* ldvt, 
00333     std::complex<T>* work, int* lwork, T* rwork, int* info
00334     )
00335     {
00336     arma_type_check<is_supported_blas_type<T>::value == false>::apply();
00337     arma_type_check<is_supported_blas_type< std::complex<T> >::value == false>::apply();
00338     
00339     if(is_float<T>::value == true)
00340       {
00341       typedef float bT;
00342       cgesvd_
00343         (
00344         jobu, jobvt, m, n, (std::complex<bT>*)a, lda,
00345         (bT*)s, (std::complex<bT>*)u, ldu, (std::complex<bT>*)vt, ldvt,
00346         (std::complex<bT>*)work, lwork, (bT*)rwork, info
00347         );
00348       }
00349     else
00350     if(is_double<T>::value == true)
00351       {
00352       typedef double bT;
00353       zgesvd_
00354         (
00355         jobu, jobvt, m, n, (std::complex<bT>*)a, lda,
00356         (bT*)s, (std::complex<bT>*)u, ldu, (std::complex<bT>*)vt, ldvt,
00357         (std::complex<bT>*)work, lwork, (bT*)rwork, info
00358         );
00359       }
00360     }
